website_summaries.verdict: An exhilarating game combining horseshoes, lawn darts, and ring toss from a premier name in outdoor toys.
pros: Simple to learn, and safe for younger children
Less expensive than other outdoor lawn games
2 different-sized rings can be used one inside the other, or separate to create different challenges
cons: Does not come with a carrying bag for transport
Replacement darts can be hard to come by

customer_reviews.title: cute but flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Dude Perfect fan was very happy about it but flimsy plastic rings that have to be clicked together were a let down. It will get used less than it would otherwise because they will probably separate. A solid plastic ring set would have been better.
customer_reviews.author: M. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Good concept... doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: Initially everything was fine and my son and I had a great time with this. After a fee uses the bags started to develop holes. I expect better quality from Nerf given the price.
customer_reviews.author: M. Huff

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: This is tons of fun. Beware though, we had a tail go on the roof and I contacted Nerf for a replacement. The person said she would be happy to send one out, but it is no longer available through them. Luckily, got it off the roof eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a dude perfect fan
customer_reviews.text: My grandson absolutely loved it. And we made our own dude perfect video that very day
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, Dude!
customer_reviews.text: My great nephew really likes Dude Perfect stunts, and he is enjoying this new activity!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Orr

customer_reviews.title: Much safer than lawn darts!!
customer_reviews.text: Fun game for the classroom! Plus you can put the targets almost anywhere to play and they are easy to store!
customer_reviews.author: Fore Caddy Golf

customer_reviews.title: Person was happy & loved it
customer_reviews.text: Was a CHRISTMAS Gift. Person was happy & loved it!! THANK YOU and have a GREAT Day!! ~Debbie~ ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Kwiecien

customer_reviews.title: Good but not our favorite.
customer_reviews.text: We love dude perfect products however this just wasn’t our favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S.

customer_reviews.title: Missing Bag
customer_reviews.text: Would be a great game except when my son opened it this evening for his birthday gift, it was missing a black bean toss bag. (Supposed to come with 2 of each color) He’s very into Dude Perfect and was very excited to compete with his Dad this evening however wasn’t able to. :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Thinner than expected but I was looking for something thin enough for my door to pass over. Holds the water off the floor. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loved it! Great for all ages and skill levels
customer_reviews.author: barb bedford

customer_reviews.title: Simple game
customer_reviews.text: Simple game, kids like it because it says "dude perfect". They use the beanies to do trick shots and don't bother with playing the actual game.
customer_reviews.author: Ktboughtit

customer_reviews.title: who love watching Dude Perfect vids
customer_reviews.text: Sons, who love watching Dude Perfect vids, lost interest after 1 day.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Hollywood

customer_reviews.title: My boys love Dude Perfect so that was a hit but otherwise ...
customer_reviews.text: Not much to it, the rings are very flimsy plastic. My boys love Dude Perfect so that was a hit but otherwise would not have been worth the money. This isn't $10 worth of materials.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Boian

customer_reviews.title: Fell short of expectations
customer_reviews.text: Very small and lightweight, rings are cheaply made as well. They are still fun just don’t work as well as previous ones. We have loved all of our dude perfect items, but these fell short of expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: 6 year old nephew loved it!
customer_reviews.text: purchased as a gift for my nephew. He loved it!
customer_reviews.author: HarlesBarkley

product_meta.title: Nerf Sports Dude Perfect, Perfect Toss Air-Tails Game - Encourage Outdoor Time - Fun, Strategic Game - Try Challenging Trick Shots - for Ages 6 and Up - Includes 4 Targets and 4 Fabric Darts
product_meta.description: Encourage your kids to spend more time outside with this Dude Perfect, Perfect Toss Air-Tails Nerf game. They’re sure to love this safe version of lawn darts; land the air-tails in the rings to score points. For an extra level of difficulty, challenge your kids to create trick shots to try. Designed for ages 6 and up.
feature_bullets: BRING THE FUN OUTSIDE - encourage your kids to bring the fun outside with this exciting, strategic, safe version of lawn darts by Nerf
HOW TO PLAY - toss the soft darts into the targets to score points. Score the most points to win
ALL INCLUDED - purchase includes 4 targets and 4 soft fabric darts
CHALLENGE YOURSELF - to add another element of difficulty to the game, challenge your kids to try some cool trick shots or increase the throwing distance
AN IDEAL HOLIDAY SURPRISE FOR CHILDREN - makes a perfect holiday idea for the kids this holiday season

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars70 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
